title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.3 - Statement to employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.3 - Statement to employee

State Regulations

Every employer shall provide to each employee a
statement, commonly referred to as a pay stub, with every payment of wages. The
pay stub must list hours worked, rates paid, gross wages, credits claimed (for
tips, meals and lodging) if any, deductions and net wages. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
146-2.3

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
